original_title: Disney Sing-Along Songs: Very Merry Christmas Songs
overview: Very Merry Christmas Songs is a Christmas-themed Sing-Along video produced by Walt Disney Home Video, originally released in December 20, 1988. It was the fifth release in the Disney Sing Along Songs series of videos, and was reissued in 1990 and 1994 as Volume 8.
title: Disney Sing-Along Songs: Very Merry Christmas Songs
